name: NationalUSHolidays
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily updates of a national holiday. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer. This skill was developed by Justin Rains
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
